She accepts the handshake, a small needle pricks DevilDuers hand 
collecting a small sample of mech fluid. "Sorry about that" She says 
trying to hold back a smile of satisfaction. "I certainly must have 
that repaired."

(What's DevilDuers beast mode? he's not on the character sheet.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Off to school. C ya all later.
> 
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer smiles, his mind playing over the possibilities. "I don't 
think 
> Zardus wouldn't mind you staying, as long as you do research for 
the Alliance 
> and such."
> 
> He sticks out his hand for her to shake, suddenly being friendly.
